name: The Sassy Squirrels Club - old V2

metadata.name: Sassy Squirrel3721
metadata.description:
SSC is a project of 10,000 Sassy Squirrels NFTs done by graphic Designers & artists, unique digital collectibles living on the Ethereum blockchain. Your Sassy Squirrel doubles as your Tree Club membership.

Our goal : To sell art, put money back to the holders to do whatever they want, and create a hub for all Squirrels to commune and create together.

Our Dream: to be one of the Biggest Fashion brands, Your Squirrel will be your proof to get your share of stocks when this dream come true, all holders are a partners in this big dream, so let's dream it let's living it

What’s Next For The Sassy Squirrel Club :Anything and everything! We have an incredible team now with such drive and passion for this project that there is not an end in sight.  Let's be the new majority. It's The Sassy Squirrels time.

www.sassysquirrelsclub.com
